pkgmetadata.longdescription: Graphical Models with Latent Variables // Three methods are provided to estimate graphical models with latent variables: (1) Jin, Y., Ning, Y., and Tan, K. M. (2020) (preprint available); (2) Chandrasekaran, V., Parrilo, P. A. Willsky, A. S. (2012) doi:10.1214/11-AOS949; (3) Tan, K. M., Ning, Y., Witten, D. M. Liu, H. (2016) doi:10.1093/biomet/asw050.
